name: tetris
description: My First Game: Remake Tetris by MVP every release. 1. Release 1: Tetris-OneBlock-0.1.jar    - Container: One Block    - Control Object: One Block    - Player Operation: Down    - Game Clear: Move control block drop into container block, then win the game. 2. Release 2: Tetris-Puzzle-0.2.jar    - Container: Two Block    - Control Object: One Block Per Time    - Player Operation: Down, Left, Right    - Game Clear: Move control block to fill container block, then win the game.
author: Fely
